originalText.text: I’ve been under Dr. Bagner’s care for over a decade now, and I can confidently say that his compassion and demeanor consistently put me at ease. I have full trust in his expertise and feel reassured in his care. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Bagner to anyone in search of exceptional medical attention.

I have full trust in his expertise and feel reassured in his care. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Bagner to anyone in search of exceptional medical attention.

originalText.text: Dr. Bagner is the best PCP I’ve ever had. You’ll never find a doctor that cares more than he does. He’s attentive, responsive and always puts his patients’ best interest first. Highly recommend!

text.text: Dr. Bagner is the best PCP I’ve ever had. You’ll never find a doctor that cares more than he does. He’s attentive, responsive and always puts his patients’ best interest first. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Dr. Bagner is a great doctor: knowledgable, caring and super nice. He always gives me a lot of time to ask questions and returns my messages promptly. I feel he has my back. I’m grateful to have him as my doctor.

text.text: Dr. Bagner is a great doctor: knowledgable, caring and super nice. He always gives me a lot of time to ask questions and returns my messages promptly. I feel he has my back. I’m grateful to have him as my doctor.

originalText.text: I’ve been going to this facility for many years. It’s professional, clean and inviting. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Wait time is usually 5 mins prior to seeing Physician. Physicians are courteous and listens to my concerns and provides solutions. During Covid I went to another facility closer to where I reside and was not pleased with the service provided and decided to return to 780 8th Ave location to continue my care with Dr. Bagner. Dr Bagner is very professional, kind and fun to chat with. Always provides solutions to my concerns and will send email or call me directly to explain my exam results. Overall, I will and have recommended this location to many friends and family members.

originalText.text: The best primary doctor I ever seen. I have been doctor Bagner for over 15 years. My adult children now sees him. I recommend Dr Bagner 100%. He knows his medical stuff.
